You must add CTCs for performance and redundancy. It is recommended that you use four of the eight CTC devices to connect SSI members by way of each channel path. Generally, eight devices are available in a Fibre Channel connection (FICON) CTC control unit. It is recommended that only four of the eight devices are used for performance reasons.
